Test driver (requires running webservice)

Created an attachment (id=75653)
Faulty generated stub

Thank you for reporting this bug. I have assigned to the correct component.
For guidance on how to select the correct component in future bug reports, please refer to:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/describecomponents.cgi?product=Web+Tools

You reported the problem on WTP 1.5.2, which supports Axis 1.3.  Could you please try the scenario again with WTP 2.0 (which has upgraded support to Axis 1.4)?  If you still run into the problem with WTP 2.0, you should try to use the standalone Axis 1.4 command line to try to reproduce the problem.

The problem you are describing is most likely an Axis 1.x emitter/runtime bug.  The Web services tools in WTP helps the user create Axis Web service using the Axis 1.x runtime.  However, the Axis 1.x runtime is a seperate Apache open source project.  Problem specific to the Axis 1.x runtime should be open against JIRA:

http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/IssueNavigator.jspa?

You should choose the Axis project and specify which Axis 1.x runtime you are using.

This defect has been in RESOLVE state for some time.  Please verify it with the latest driver.  WTP 2.0.1 RC1 is available at:

http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/R2.0/M-2.0.1RC1-20070907070540/
